nodes.text: Grig, also called Grig City, was one of the cities on the planet Narg. It was served by Grig Starport, located on Starport Street, and was the location of the TransGalMeg Industries, Incorporated Administration Center, Grig Employee Training School, TGM Hospital, and the Free Access Grill, all on Central Avenue. Stark Municipal Park was also located within the city limits.
